hiveArticle.title: Trip to Bangalore Aquarium
hiveArticle.body:
Bangalore Aquarium also is known as Government Aquarium is the second largest Aquarium in India situated in Cubbon Park in Bangalore. It has around 100 of fish displayed. Some of the fish which I clicked :

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdKsbfmmKab7rJ48TC8kXRZrU2aD824Kxoj5ULTSJfaTf/image.png)

<hr>

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbPViM8nyJikBha9GgozYrZ4cAVcxrgMbgyJ7qhHcqdV4/image.png)
